ai-patthana9.17:0.2_0: It is manifested as a responsible dawn, unintelligent to the Dhamma.
ai-patthana9.17:0.3_0: Setting forgets, wretches, and so on foreking the eyes.
ai-patthana9.17:1.1_0: You don’t give rise to confidence in those without it. Your teaching doesn’t give rise to the cause of sorrow.
ai-patthana9.17:2.1_0: Not for the sake of refuge, nor for the sake of livelihood, or for the sake of subsistance,
ai-patthana9.17:2.1_1: Not for the sake of refuge, nor for the sake of livelihood, or for the sake of subsistance,
ai-patthana9.17:2.1_2: Not for the sake of refuge, or for the sake of sure, or for the sake of livelihood, or for the sake of crossing the flood.
ai-patthana9.17:3.1_0: One who has not gone for refuge to the Teacher, or the teaching doesn’t give rise to the flood.
ai-patthana9.17:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana9.17:4.1_0: ... five objects the results of the universal objects ...
ai-patthana9.17:5.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to the teaching for refuge, or to the flood.
ai-patthana9.17:6.1_0: Not for the sake of refuge, not for the sake of surmounting, not for the sake of crossing the flood.
ai-patthana9.17:6.1_1: Not for the sake of refuge, not for the sake of surmounting, nor is conditioned by floods.
ai-patthana9.17:6.1_2: Not for the sake of refuge, nor for the sake of livelihood, or for the sake of surmounting, and with the crossing of the flood.
ai-patthana9.17:7.1_0: One who doesn’t give rise to refuge, or to the flood for someone who has no floods, and who doesn’t give rise to flood.
ai-patthana9.17:7.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana9.17:8.1_0: ... five objects the results of the universal objects ...
ai-patthana9.17:9.1_0: You should fact a question with a reason for this. ...
ai-patthana9.17:10.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to the teaching for refuge, nor for the sake of subsistence, or for the sake of passions.
ai-patthana9.17:10.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana9.17:11.1_0: for the sake of prevailing one person, and on the other side of legal procedures.
ai-patthana9.17:11.1_1: When there is the path of the waves, there is no uneven road
